sqlMap.select:
SELECT ID ,TERMINAL_ID ,ORG_SUB_MER_ID ,ORG_MER_SYS_ID ,ORG_LOGIN_NAME ,ORG_LOGIN_PWD ,ORG_VERSION ,CHANGE_DATE ,CHANGE_DESC ,RESERVED FROM TERMINAL_CHANGE_LOG WHERE 1=1 AND TERMINAL_CHANGE_LOG.END_DATE=TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'yyyy-MM-dd')
(ID) =#id#
(TERMINAL_ID) Like '%'||(#terminal_id:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(ORG_SUB_MER_ID) =#org_sub_mer_id#
(ORG_MER_SYS_ID) =#org_mer_sys_id#
(ORG_LOGIN_NAME) Like '%'||(#org_login_name:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(ORG_LOGIN_PWD) Like '%'||(#org_login_pwd:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(ORG_VERSION) Like '%'||(#org_version:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(CHANGE_DATE) Like '%'||(#change_date:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(CHANGE_DESC) Like '%'||(#change_desc:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(RESERVED) Like '%'||(#reserved:VARCHAR#)||'%'
$orderStr$

SELECT count(1) FROM TERMINAL_CHANGE_LOG WHERE 1=1 AND TERMINAL_CHANGE_LOG.END_DATE=TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'yyyy-MM-dd')
(ID) =#id#
(TERMINAL_ID) Like '%'||(#terminal_id:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(ORG_SUB_MER_ID) =#org_sub_mer_id#
(ORG_MER_SYS_ID) =#org_mer_sys_id#
(ORG_LOGIN_NAME) Like '%'||(#org_login_name:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(ORG_LOGIN_PWD) Like '%'||(#org_login_pwd:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(ORG_VERSION) Like '%'||(#org_version:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(CHANGE_DATE) Like '%'||(#change_date:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(CHANGE_DESC) Like '%'||(#change_desc:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(RESERVED) Like '%'||(#reserved:VARCHAR#)||'%'
